content:
The cushioning and support of the ASICS Gel-Kayano 28 are amazing! I can really feel the difference compared to my old shoes, especially on my longer runs. My feet don't feel as fatigued, and I've noticed less strain on my ankles and knees. As for my running form, I think the new shoes have actually helped me to maintain a more consistent stride and posture, which has improved my overall efficiency and endurance.

Speaking of running, I've been thinking about joining a local running group or club to mix up my routine and meet some new people who share my passion for running. Do you have any advice on how to find a good running group or club in my area?
